name: Dotz (itch)
description:
Dotz is a local multiplayer puzzle game about connecting dots, based on a classic pen-and-paper game.  Player take turns connecting adjacent dots in order to complete squares; when all squares are filled, the player who completed the most wins.

Supports 2-7 human or AI-controlled players.

This is the second release by asobou Interactive.

Credits:

  • Programming, Design, Music:  Bryan Taylor
  • Art, SFX, Fonts:             Kenny (kenney.nl/assets)

Made with Unity.
